alert.note: Alert for Ontonagon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 2:39PM EST until January 25 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches, with locally up to 10 inches possible in a narrow band from near Ontonagon to near Rockland. Lighter snow amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected near Bergland and Bruce Crossing south to Paulding. * WHERE...Ontonagon County. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Cold wind chills of 20 to 25 below zero tomorrow morning could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
